thread.title: Selena Gomez announces 'Revival' world tour
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez announces 'Revival' world tour - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Selena Gomez announces 'Revival' world tour
text:
Selena Gomez will go on a world tour next year in support of her new album Revival . The 23-year-old announced the tour in a video on Instagram, reports aceshowbiz.com.
READ: Selena Gomez unveils music video featuring fans
In the clip taken in her hotel room, Gomez says in front of the camera: "I am launching my 'Revival' world tour. I will be going through the US and Canada from May to July and then later in the year going overseas." She captioned the video with a link to a new website featuring a countdown that will end on Monday, with the revelation of the tour dates.
For latest Music updates, follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
"Revival", marking Gomez's first album since leaving the Disney-owned Hollywood Records, is due to be out on October 9. It has so far spawned singles 'Good for you ' and 'Same old love' .
